page.title: 05HOUSEHOLD EQUIPMENT
page.content:
Fifty-three families have cookers and the rest have an aga or a microwave. A cooker is something you cook your food with. Twelve families have a microwave.
Fifty-five families have washers and the rest go to a launderette. Washers are things you wash clothes with. Tumble driers are used to dry clothes. Thirty-one families own tumble driers, the rest have washing lines. Thirty-eight families have freezers, every home has a fridge. Fridges and freezers are used to keep milk, cheese eggs and other food cold.
Fifty-five families have vacuum cleaners and the rest have carpet sweepers. A vacuum cleaner is used to clean the carpet.
